remarks: Any element is less than or equal to a poset's upper bound (if defined).  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 13-Sep-2018.)
statement:
ple1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ple1.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
ple1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ple1.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
ple1.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
ple1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ple1.d $e |- ( ph -> B e. dom U ) $.
ple1 $p |- ( ph -> X .<_ .1. ) $.
